name: ice-beam
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Blasts the foe with an icy beam that may freeze it.
flavor_text.emerald: Blasts the foe with an icy beam that may freeze it.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: The foe is struck with an icy beam. It may freeze the foe solid.
